page.title: 06KING EDWARD'S SCHOOL,WITLEY
page.content: { {Curriculum} There are 27 subjects taught at the school.These are Art, Art History, Biology,Chemistry,German,English, French,Geography,History,Human Biology, Political Studies,Italian, Economics,Latin,Mathematics, Needlework,Physics,Computer Studies, Religious Knowledge,Engineering, Engineering Drawing,Design,Craft Design Technology,Geology,Music,P.E,{ and Food Nutrition. {Pupils There are 526 pupils aged 11 to 16.Pupils can stay on until they are 18 years old.The boys wear a grey suit and black suits if they are prefects. The girls wear a maroon sweater and a grey skirt.There are 6 boy and 6 girl prefects.There is a Head boy and a Head girl.There are 101 day pupils.
